page.title: 03Family Life in Heolgerrig.
page.content: My name is Priya Kumar,I am a Hindu, and I live in Castle Park, Merthyr Tydfil. I was born in Oxford in Banbury Cross. My father is a doctor who came to Britain in 1968, he works in the Hollies Health Centre. His name is Dr. Aroon Kumar. My mother's name is Parool and she doesn't work. I am the second of three children. The other two are boys aged 12 and 3. My elder brother is attending a boarding school in India, but now he is on vacation. The other brother goes to the school nursery. As Hindus, we have more religious festivals than Christians, as we worship one god who has lots of names. We eat English and Indian foods at home, a typical Indian meal we have is rice, two or three vegetables and a special dish of meat.
